body_html:
@navneethc @aalexsmithh @cy89 Hi could some one help me out , i have installed cuda 9.1 with cuddn 7.1 and all the dlls are present in the folder yet when i try to use tensorflow gpu it give me "ImportError: Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll'. TensorFlow requires that this DLL be installed in a directory that is named in your %PATH% environment variable. Download and install CUDA 9.0 from this URL: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-toolkit" but when i download the cuda 9.0 it again gives the same error saying cudart64_80.dll is not available .

I have tired installing all the version of the tensorflow and cuda yet i get error i have checked the path variable to not sure why i am getting this error

body:
@navneethc @aalexsmithh @cy89  Hi could some one help me out , i have installed cuda 9.1 with cuddn 7.1 and all the dlls are present in the folder yet when i try to use tensorflow gpu it give me "ImportError: Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll'. TensorFlow requires that this DLL be installed in a directory that is named in your %PATH% environment variable. Download and install CUDA 9.0 from this URL: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-toolkit" but when i download the cuda 9.0 it again gives the same error saying cudart64_80.dll is not available . 

I have tired installing all the version of the tensorflow and cuda yet i get error i have checked the path variable to not sure why i am getting this error
